text: geudaeege geu chaeg-eul gyesihan bun i hananim-isimyeo geu an-eneun geunbon ui malsseum-i iss-eo seongseoui mochega doego daleun geos-eun biyujeog-ila geuleona geudeul simjung-e uisim-eul gajinjadeul-eun biyujeog-in geos-eul ttala iseol-eul joseong hago geuan-e sumgyeojin geos-eul galguha na hananim oeeneun amudo sumgyeojin uimileul alji moshadoda eotteon jisig e insigdoeeobeolin jadeul-eun ulineun geugeos-eul midnaida modeun geos-eun uli ui junim-eulobuteo wassnaida lago malhana jisig-eul gajinja oeeneun a mudo geu uimileul ihaehal su eobsnola
